segments.text: Were you engaged in any activities at college ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I had no interest in the activities in college and I spent most of my spare time reading in the library .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of activity would make you get involved ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: None , I guess . My only passion is on reading .
segments.speaker: S2
